thread.section_title: The Kensington - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (London, England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Proper boutique experience
thread.title_full: Proper boutique experience - Review of The Kensington, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Back_to_Sandringham
title: Proper boutique experience
text: Unfortunately I only stayed for one night, but it was long enough to determine that this is a proper boutique hotel. Small, cozy and very classy. Admittedly my room was tiny (you had to squeeze sideways between the end of the bed and the wardrobe), but it was extremely well appointed. The bar area is lovely, and the attention to detail throughout the property is of high standard. If you are going to be based in West London, this is a great choice.
